author: Eric Bellman
title: Trump Inauguration: Why One of India’s Top Female CEOs Took Out an Ad to Congratulate the President
text:
0 COMMENTS ENLARGE Full page ad in The Times of India celebrating Donald Trump's inauguration as president. Photo: Eric Bellman/The Wall Street Journal 
When Donald Trump was inaugurated Friday, people tuned in from across the world to watch.
